Overview:
       

Renewable Energy or “Green Power” is an exciting product or pricing program for utilities to offer their customers, but experience has shown that not all utilities enjoy huge successes with these programs. Customers respond favorably when green pricing products and programs are well designed and marketed. How can you ensure your green power pricing program is going to succeed to your expectations?
EUCI’s 4th Annual Marketing Green Power conference was designed for utilities seeking to shorten their learning curve on how to design and market their green power pricing programs. Our conference speakers represent market leaders, potential partners, and utilities that have pioneered green pricing programs. At this event, they share their experiences with program design, launch and adoption. Case study presentations reveal the challenges faced and how those hurdles were overcome.
Hear from utilities in the U.S. that are leaders of Green Energy Programs as they detail their marketing strategies, display marketing materials, and share their successes with you.
Attendees of This Conference Will Learn To:


Understand trends in utility green pricing programs

Utilize RECs as part of the procurement strategy in green pricing programs

Predict commercial performance as it relates to timing and technology

Learn how to leverage product labeling initiatives

Identify effective green power marketing messages

Increase participation rates in green power program adoption

Leverage the marketing power of commercial customers to spread the green power message

Communicate the value proposition of green power pricing to customers

Integrate marketing strategies to exceed expectations

          EUCI’s 4th Annual Marketing Green Power conference features interactive discussion on how to design your marketing program, partner with other firms and organizations, reach your target market, gain sign-ups and eventually offer premium customer service for this premium product offering. 

          It features executive level speakers with years of experience successfully leading their organizations to achieve the highest measures in green power programs. Register today to participate in this important discussion, focusing on key drivers that led to the success of the top green pricing programs in the country!
